thread.title: East Bay high school scoreboard for Friday, Oct. 2

author: Bay Area News Group
title: East Bay high school scoreboard for Friday, Oct. 2
text:
East Bay high school scoreboard for Friday, Oct. 2 Bay Area News Group Posted: 10/02/2015 09:58:18 PM PDT Updated: 10/02/2015 09:58:19 PM PDT REPORTING RESULTS www.insidebayarea.com/high-school-sports under "Submit Your Scores" Phone: 925-943-8247 Thursday EBAL Foothill 217, Cal 254 At Callippe GC, par 36 39 -- Kristen (F), 40 -- Liguidliguid (F), 42 -- Conion (C), 44 -- G. Puspoki (F), 46 -- Kasavan (F), 48 -- Hong (F), 50 -- Chen (C), Tjan (C), 51 -- Terciano (C), 60 -- Kahn (C). Record: Foothill 4-6. TCAL-Rock St. Joseph Notre Dame, 205 Hercules 214 At Franklin Canyon, GC, par 36 31 -- Rhatigan (SJND), 36 -- Hauck (SJND), 39 -- Jones (H), 41 -- Johnson (H), 43 -- Serrana (H), 44 -- O'Connor (SJND), 45 -- Tam (H), 46 -- Saxton (SJND),46 -- Lopez (H), 48 -- Patrick(SJND). Note: Match ended after 7-holes due to darkness. tennis-g TCAL Albany 5, Hercules 2 Advertisement Singles: Chuang (A) d. Ferrera 6-1, 6-0; Elder-Ernst (A) d. Navarro 6-3, 6-4; Siu (H) d. Che 6-2, 6-2; Ingalls (A) d. Diaz 8-6. Doubles: Chen/Yang (A) d. Kumar/Munoz 7-5, 6-4; M Mallari/Delacruz (H) d. Abbott/Ag 6-2, 6-7, 6-5; Lee/Wang (A) d. Kwon/K Mallari 6-3, 6-0. Record: Hercules 1-7. Thursday BCL East Bentley 5, Fremont Christian 2 Singles: Munigan (FC) d. Reeves 6-4, 6-2; Kroger (B) d. Zhao 6-0, 6-1; Koo (B) d. Porter 6-1, 6-2; Su (B) d. Chicero 6-3, 6-2. Doubles: Rosen/Williams (B) d. Serilla/Prewitt 6-2, 4-6, 10-1; Lifter/Partsuf (B) d. Maling/Valezquez 6-3, 4-6, 10-8; Higgins/Miller (FC) d. Hare/Feng 8-6. Head Royce 7, Livermore Valley Charter 0 Singles: Yeh d. Hendrickson 6-0, 6-3; Mears d. Miranda 6-1, 6-1; LaVoie d. Kenfack 8-2; Nymazuwe d. Toombs 6-3, 6-2. Doubles: DePetra/Rucker d. Babu/Chin 6-2, 6-3; Hoerner/Medford d. Ornelas/Stanley 8-1; Balla/Admokom d. Meyer/Cervantez 8-3. VOLLEYBALL-G BCL Holy Names d. Oakland Military Institute Scores: 25-23, 25-20, 12-25, 25-20. Highlights: HN -- Cruzen 5 aces, 3 kills, 6 assists, 8 digs; Jiminez 2 aces, 3 kills, 8 assists, 4 digs; Wedman 2 aces, 6 kills, 6 digs. Record: Holy Names 7-1, 4-1. Thursday DFAL Miramonte d. Dublin Scores: 24-26, 25-17, 25-18, 25-18. Highlights: M -- Sharp 12 kills, 15 digs, 5 aces; Shafer 17 kills 3 blocks, 2 digs; Fabian 20 digs, 1 kill, 1 ace. Record: Miramonte 12-5, 3-1. Acalanes d. Las Lomas Scores: 25-11, 25-15, 25-16. Highlights: A -- Jones 13 kills, 6 digs; Lam 16 digs; Bolen 26 assists. Record: Acalanes 1-1 DFAL. EBAL San Ramon Valley d. Granada Scores: 26-24, 25-16, 25-20. Highlights: SRV -- Claybaugh 7 aces, 10 kills; Sehrt 3 kills, 3 aces, 4 blocks; Strand 23 assists. Record: San Ramon Valley 11-4, 4-0 EBAL. VOLLEYBALL-W BVC Los Medanos d. College of Marin Scores: 25-22, 25-19, 25-19. Highlights: LMC -- Green 12 kills, 5 digs; Sadler 14 service points, 12 kills, 6 digs; Dejesus 32 assists, 19 digs; Seei 9 kills. Record: Los Medanos 6-6, 4-0. Coast Conference-South Ohlone d. De Anza Scores: 25-17, 25-18, 25-17. Highlights: O -- Brochu 11 kills, 12 digs; Ward 8 kills, 2 blocks; Hill 17 assists. WATER POLO-G Monte Vista 10, Acalanes 6 Halftime: 4-4. Scoring: MV -- Trujillo 6, A.Milham 2, Malin, Indart; A -- Myall 5, Wentzel. Assists: MV -- Lewis 3, Indart 2, A Milham, Miller. Saves: Davis (MV) 9, Felner (A) 14. Record: Monte Vista 11-3. Calendar Saturday
